name: Float On
description:
You're filling up with gas and the only way to survive is by getting it out! Belch your way through 10 distinct stages in this all-new Anti-Platformer from the makers of Project MALLOW.

Controls: Mouse to rotate, left click to expel gas. Right click or Enter/Return to pause (Pause menu is slightly wonky).

Float On was developed as part of Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018. The theme - "genre, without mechanic" - inspired a game where the goal is not to jump, but to fall.
